subject: Bull Riding
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Since October 2009, no professional bull rider has been able to stay on Bushwacker for eight seconds. At a recent event in Pueblo, Colo., the riders explained why he's so tough to ride.
snippet: Since October 2009, no professional bull rider has been able to stay on Bushwacker for eight seconds. At a recent event in Pueblo, Colo., the riders explained why he's so tough to ride.
